author: Kate King
title: Meet the Women Reshaping New Jersey Politics
text:
Colleen Mahr is running for a position that few women hold but is among the most powerful in New Jersey politics—county leader of a political-party organization.
The chairs of the Democratic and Republican parties in each of New Jersey’s 21 counties wield significant power, leading organizations that make endorsements in primary elections, provide chosen candidates with fundraising support and award prominent ballot spots.
Seven... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
